readability_reflection: Concatenation, as im used to C++, it just seemed more familiar to me.
comprehension_debugging: Concatentation was easier to understand/debug code over string interpolation. With string interpolation, I had to think a bit, and the brackets are distracting.
preference_rationale: Personally, I would use string concatenation, but I cans ee the use of string interpolation. Overall though I have to go with string concatenation as it is easier to read for me.
learning_curve: From C++, i was way more familiar with concatenation, while we dont really use interpolation {} in C++.
suggestions_improvement: Definitely recommend using string concatenation syntax, as it is more similar to "human" language, and therefore easier to read.
